channel.title: Cybersecurity, Cloud and WebAssembly
channel.description: Insights into Cybersecurity, Cloud computing, and WebAssembly

item.title: WAFs: The Magical Barriers of Cybersecurity
item.description: Dive into the world of firewalls, understanding their function, exploring traditional and modern versions, and discovering the promising newcomer, Coraza, all through the lens of Japanese anime barriers.
item.author: bGl3ZWlqaWFuLmh1c3RAZ21haWwuY29t@decode-in-base64 (Supa Safe)
